articles.description: LONDON - A keenly-watched COVID-19 vaccine will be priced to allow as wide as possible access to it, if it proves successful, and will be made at huge scale to keep costs down and supply up, said the Oxford University professor co-leading its development.
articles.title: Keenly-watched COVID-19 vaccine 'won't be expensive', developer says - TODAYonline
